title: NewYork
body:
<<if $hasTalked = false>>
Here to take a bite out of the Big Apple?

[[Jazz: I guess|NewYork3]]
<<set $hasTalked = true>>
<<else>>
So you ready to dance, doll?

[[Jazz: Ab-so-lute-ly|StaySwing]]

[[Jazz: Not feeling it|DislikeSwing]]
<<endif>>

title: NewYork3
body:
Bet you're thinking this is the cat's meow, ain't ya, doll?

[[Jazz: And how!|LikeSwing]]

[[Jazz: Not really|DislikeSwing]]

title: LikeSwing
body:
You have fine taste there, pal. You much of a swing dancer?

[[Jazz: Ab-so-lute-ly|StaySwing]]

[[Jazz: Not really|SwingFail]]

title: DislikeSwing
body:
Not your thing, eh? 

Not a problem! I'll be here hunkering down on the hooch.

Come find me if you're itchin' to dance

title: BebopStart2
body:
<<Switch SceneEssentials NewYork2>>

Spike: You like it, cool cat? This is Bebop!!

[[Jazz: I love it!|BebopWin]]

[[Jazz: I can't dance to this|BebopAlmostLoss]]

title: StaySwing
body:
You let the tunes move you across the dance floor. Your dance partner is obviously impressed.

Dapper Gentleman: Hot dawg! You Slay me, doll. I am totally goofy over you. Too bad the bank's closed.
But here, I got something else for ya.

[[Accept gift|GetSwing]]

[[Jazz: No thanks, mac|SwingFail]]

title: BebopFail
body:
Spike: Aw Rhatz! That's a disappointment, if ever there was one. 

Well, you have a good evening there, pal.

The energetic individual walked away.

There was nothing left for you to do here.

title: BebopAlmostLoss
body:
Spike: No rules to keep us in the box. Just a cat, and the Blues. 
Spike: Isn't it great? 

[[Jazz: And how!|BebopWin]]

[[Jazz: I am not really feeling it.|BebopFail]]

title: BebopWin
body:
Spike: I knew you'd love it! Here I got something for you.

You received the Spirit of Bebop.

Spike: Put this to good use, cool cat. I'll be seeing you.

<<set $inventory = $inventory+1>>
<<set $bebop = true>>
<<Get Canvas Bebop>>

title: GetSwing
body:
You receive THE SPIRIT OF SWING

Something tells me you got other places you gotta be, doll. 
You take care now, you hear?


<<set $inventory = $inventory+1>>
<<set $swing = true>>
<<Get Canvas Swing>>

title: BebopStart
body:
You wanna quit this overpriced juice-joint and go listen to some real music, honey?

[[Jazz: Sure!|BebopStart2]]

[[Jazz: You're not shady at all|BebopNo]]

title: BebopBar
body:
You like it, cool cat? This is Bebop!!

[[Jazz: I love it!|BebopWin]]

[[Jazz: I can't dance to this|BebopAlmostLoss]]

title: SwingFail
body:
A shame, really. Well, I have to go see a man about a dog. Be seeing ya.

There doesn't seem to be anything else for you to do here.
